mapper.insert: insert into tz_status_info (tzxt, table_no, tz_status, admin_id) values (#{tzxt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tzStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, tzxt, table_no, tz_status, admin_id from tz_status_info where admin_id = #{adminId} AND table_no = #{tableNo} AND tzxt = #{tzxt} limit 1
select id, tzxt, table_no, tz_status, admin_id from tz_status_info
